algorithm_technique: Calculate contribution of each vowel to total vowel count across all substrings.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the total number of vowels across all possible substrings of a given string.
problem_summary_technical: For each vowel at index `i`, it contributes to `(i+1) * (n-i)` substrings. Sum these contributions.
key_insights: Instead of generating all substrings, consider the contribution of each vowel individually.
A vowel at index `i` in a string of length `n` will be part of `(i + 1) * (n - i)` substrings.
The total sum is the sum of these contributions for all vowels in the string.
